articles.description: Two new variants of COVID causing coronavirus have been found. Termed as 'FLiRT' these variants include KP.2 and KP.1.1.
articles.content: COVID signs to note are: Sore throat, cough, fatigue, nasal congestion, runny nose, headache, muscle aches, fever, and possible loss of taste and smell.

articles.title: 13 fruits that can help lower cholesterol level naturally - The Times of India
articles.description: High cholesterol is a silent killer. Apart from medicinal dependency it is ideal to follow natural remedies to keep cholesterol under control. Here are 13 fruits that can help lower cholesterol.
